get.summary: Retrieves the collection of TeamUser resources.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page

GetTeamUserItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /team_users/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Team resources.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page

GetTeamItem.description: The `slug` value returned in the response can be used as the `slug` parameter in `GET /teams/{slug}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of User resources.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page

GetUserItem.description: The `slug` value returned in the response can be used as the `slug` parameter in `GET /users/{slug}`.
